room_title: Escape room "School of Magic" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
room_address: 44325 W 12 Mile Ste H175 Novi, MI 48377
room_description:
You and your friends are new students at the hidden and mysterious School of Magic. You have heard of the rumors of the return of this great evil. Suddenly, a scream is heard coming from a dark hallway. All the other instructors and students have been put under a strange spell.
You and your crew are the only ones unaffected. It's up to you to face this evil head-on. Time is of the essence to find all the ancient relics and stop this ancient evil.
